title: BRIEF-Geyser Brands Launches New Premium Brand Line, Stond Naturals
text:
BRIEF-Geyser Brands Launches New Premium Brand Line, Stond Naturals

Stock Markets 35 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 06:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Geyser Brands Launches New Premium Brand Line, Stond Naturals Geyser Brands Inc GYSR.V : * GEYSER BRANDS LAUNCHES NEW PREMIUM BRAND LINE, STOND NATURALS * GEYSER BRANDS INC - COMPANY ALSO PLANS TO EXTEND BRAND INTO REGULATED CANNABIS SPACE WITH SUBSTITUTION OF CBD FOR SEED OIL IN SAME FORMULATIONS
